column1: This site is all about fresh flowers and good quality vases that you can purchase online.
We use your feedback to improve our website.
Delivery should not take too long
column2: it depends on where you are staying.

column1: I am sorry but we do not have yellow roses.
All the flowers are brought fresh from the garden near our delivery houses.
Our site hasn't been here for too long
column2: it's just been a couple of months.

column1: We have a vast collection of vases.
We have pink lilies as well.
